hooks.command: GHOSTKILL=$(which ghostkill 2>/dev/null); if [ -x "$GHOSTKILL" ]; then OUTPUT=$("$GHOSTKILL" 2>/dev/null); if echo "$OUTPUT" | grep -q '⚠'; then echo '=== ghostkill: environment issues detected ==='; echo "$OUTPUT" | grep '⚠' | head -5; echo "Run ghostkill --fix to clean up"; echo '=============================================='; fi; fi
